Text: Pampanga or "Pampaŋga" (Kapampangan: "Lalawigan ng Pampanga" ; Filipino: "Lalawigan ng Pampanga" ) is a province in the Central Luzon region of the Philippines.

ere are the extracted triplets:

--------------------
<Text: Pampanga:  Lying on the northern shore of Manila Bay, Pampanga is bordered by Tarlac to the north, Nueva Ecija to the northeast, Bulacan to the east, the Manila Bay to the central-south, Bataan to the southwest and Zambales to the west.>

2:
--------------------
Text: Pampanga:  Its capital is the City of San Fernando.
